AT0041.title: Offer Wall Tools
AT0041.description: An Offer Wall Tool is an advertising or marketing tool typically used with mobile apps or online platforms. Its main purpose is to earn virtual points, reward points, or coupons by having users complete specific tasks, activities, or transactions. These tasks typically include participating in surveys, trying other apps, registering memberships, and watching ad videos. Offer wall tools are usually provided by advertising platforms or third-party providers and integrated into apps or websites to increase user engagement and retention.
